definition: fleeting time/horoscope for the year
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
surname Nian
year/CL:個|个[ge4]
the year's horoscope augurs ill (idiom); an unlucky year
to cast sb's yearly horoscope

sentences.english: Accepted and run, let love stand the fleeting time.
sentences.chinese: 接納與磨合，讓愛經得起流年。

sentences.english: Thee cool rain, cool thin fleeting.
I weep for the drifting years.
sentences.chinese: 我爲了似水流年而流淚。

sentences.english: Years passing by quickly as if them flying.
Recalling the years flowing away as the music's slowly running.
sentences.chinese: 隨着音樂的緩緩流動，仿若追憶似水流年。

sentences.english: We might do except the recollection once years rolling like a stream safe.
sentences.chinese: 我們除了回想曾經的似水流年無事可做。

sentences.english: In the fleeting sadness, opened in the summer sun is the most beautiful day.
sentences.chinese: 流年裏的憂傷，開在了夏季陽光最明媚那一天。

sentences.english: The words I love you, lost in the unease.
sentences.chinese: 那句我愛你，遺失在流年裏。

sentences.english: Who gave me love placid who accompany me to see through the fleeting landscape.
sentences.chinese: 㦨翩誰給我波瀾不驚的愛情，誰陪我看透流年的風景。

sentences.english: Red nightmare, rain fall on the stump, got drunk Zen Chen flurry, u…

sentences.english: A visitor took photos of the candlelit miniature Kamakura, or snow huts, on Monday during the Kamakura Snow Festival in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 一名遊客在日本鎌倉冰雪節的微型鎌倉前拍照流年。

sentences.english: Cannot stand up to the years rolling like a stream, and cannot escape the youth.
sentences.chinese: 經不住似水流年，逃不過此間少年。

sentences.english: She rose to stardom with the song "Homecoming" in 1984.
sentences.chinese: 1984年，她以“似水流年”迅速成爲當紅明星。

sentences.english: Broken flower-like fleeting, smile as the most beautiful embellishment.
sentences.chinese: 花般破碎的流年，笑容成爲最美的點綴。

sentences.english: Spend a beautiful matching, but The Flood of Years.
sentences.chinese: 如花美眷，終不過似水流年。

sentences.english: Is the most sentimental time, his coffin.
sentences.chinese: 最最傷感是流年，白髮罩住了紅顏。
